tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Reccurent Pregnancy Loss,
review:
A Guiding Light on Our Journey to Parenthood.

We had an exceptional experience with Dr. Shikha Gurnani, our beautiful gynecologist. She is not just an excellent doctor but also a kind and compassionate HUMAN BEING. From the very beginning, Dr. Gurnani was a guiding light. She meticulously conducted all the necessary tests and explained everything in detail about the changes I could expect. Her approachable and friendly demeanor, coupled with her selfless service and social work, truly set her apart. I always felt comfortable and well-cared for during my visits. 

Dr. Shikha Gurnani is very polite, genuine, yet very professional. She explains every aspect of the current diagnosis in detail, whether it's positive or negative. Her treatment is effective, and she ensures that her patients receive the best care possible.

We wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Shikha to every expecting parent. Her patience, empathy, and professionalism make every visit comfortable and reassuring. She takes the time to listen to concerns and provides clear instructions for a healthy pregnancy. We are incredibly grateful for her unwavering support and dedication.

She gave us a space where we have joked and laughed about anything we felt about with her. 

With a vast experience many doctors lose the human touch in their treatment and that was our biggest concern. And we can say this from bottom of our heart that it's not the case with Dr Shikha. She'll make you feel that it's her responsibility to take good care of your baby and you. 

Thank you, Dr. Shikha Gurnani, for making our dream of parenthood come true. Our beautiful daughter Twisha is a testament to your expertise and compassion.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shikha is an exceptional gynecologist. Her expertise is truly commendable, providing comprehensive care with a reassuring demeanor. Her attentive approach and clear communication made me feel comfortable discussing sensitive health matters. Dr. Shikha addressed all my concerns with professionalism and compassion, ensuring I felt heard and understood. 

Since this was our first child, we were unaware of what we were getting into. Dr. Shikha constantly reassured us and kept us informed of what was happening both to my body and emotions. Every step of the way, we knew we were in good hands.

She made herself very approachable and available to me. Her passionate way of interacting with her patients made us become very faithful in her approach. She is compassionate, thoughtful, dedicated to providing the best patient care. The months leading up to the big day were full of questions and concerns, but we were handled so well by her and answered all our queries with a smile. Her calm demeanor and positive aura helped create a tranquil environment during this once in a lifetime event.

I will always be grateful for the excellent care provided by Dr. Shikha and her entire team at Bloom Vision.

From a stress-free delivery to a perfect, quick healing circumcision, the C-section was a great stress free experience.

Thank you Ma‚Äôam for making this experience a wonderful one! :) We highly recommend Dr. Shikha for her outstanding expertise and patient-centered care. A definite five-star experience. üëç


With love n regards

Greeshma & Anish

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Thank you Dr SHIKHA for the exceptional care you provided during both of my pregnancies. Your expertise and support were invaluable in guiding me through the birthing process each time. Your dedication to your patients and your ability to make us feel comfortable and at ease is highly appreciated. I am grateful for the quality of care you provided during my both pregnancies.
During my first pregnancy, I was disappointed and frustrated that another doctor refused to treat me just one week before my delivery. It was a stressful and concerning situation, and I was left in a vulnerable position with a critical need for medical care with high BP. Your willingness to step in and provide me with the necessary treatment and support during such a crucial time was truly appreciated. Your willingness to accept and take on this responsibility at such short notice speaks volumes about your dedication to patients and commitment to delivering quality healthcare. Thank you for your prompt and compassionate care when I needed it most.
 I would highly recommend you to others in need of a gynecologist for pregnancy and childbirth. Thank you for your outstanding care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shikha Gurnani is an exceptional professional. Her expertise, compassion, and dedication to patient care are truly commendable. I had a wonderful experience during my recent visit. Dr. Gurnani took the time to listen to my concerns, thoroughly explained the treatment options, and ensured I felt comfortable throughout. I highly recommend her to anyone seeking top-notch medical care!‚Äù

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Choosing Dr. Shikha as my gynecologist was one of the best decisions I made throughout my pregnancy journey and beyond. From my very first appointment, I felt genuinely cared for and understood. Dr. Shikha warm demeanor and thorough explanations immediately put me at ease, making each visit a positive experience.During my pregnancy,  Dr.Shikha provided exceptional care, ensuring all my concerns were addressed and guiding me through each with professionalism and empathy. On the day of the C-section, Dr. Shikha and the surgical team were efficient and compassionate. They ensured I felt comfortable and informed every step of the way, from anesthesia to the delivery itself.During my hospital stay, Dr. Shikha visited regularly to monitor my recovery progress. Her attentiveness and bedside manner were reassuring during this critical time.Post-surgery, Dr Shikha continued to monitor my recovery closely, offering clear instructions and support to aid in my healing process. Their follow-up care was attentive, ensuring any post-operative concerns were promptly addressed.Overall, I cannot thank Dr. Shikha enough for their exceptional care and dedication throughout my journey from pregnancy to post-surgery. Their expertise, combined with a compassionate approach, made all the difference in my experience. I highly recommend Dr Shikha to anyone seeking a gynecologist who goes above and beyond for their patients.\

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
context: High Risk Pregnancy management,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review: Dr. Shikha Gurnani is a truly exceptional doctor and a guardian angel in disguise! During my high-risk pregnancy, she showed immense care and expertise, skillfully managing my septate uterus condition. Her dedication and expertise enabled me to deliver my baby normally in the 31st week, a miracle I'll forever cherish. Dr. Gurnani's kindness, compassion, and medical brilliance made the impossible possible - she helped me become a mother! I'm eternally grateful for her care and highly recommend her to anyone seeking an outstanding obstetrician.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I want to share my incredible journey with Dr. Shikha Gurnani. I initially visited her because I wanted to conceive and had been struggling with PCOD for many years. From the very beginning, Dr. Gurnani was a guiding light. She meticulously conducted all the necessary tests and explained everything in detail about the changes I could expect.

Thanks to her expert guidance and unwavering support, I successfully conceived and delivered my baby last month. Dr. Gurnani's friendly, humble, and polite nature made every appointment a reassuring experience. She always ensured that I understood every aspect of my treatment, leaving no room for doubt.

I am immensely grateful for her care and dedication. Without a doubt, I will be visiting Dr. Shikha Gurnani for any future pregnancies. I highly recommend her to anyone trying to conceive or dealing with any gynecological issues. She truly is a remarkable doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Shikha is a fantastic gynecologist whose skill and dedication are impressive. From my first visit to her clinic while planning my first pregnancy to now having two kids, she has always shown warmth and professionalism. 

During my first pregnancy, I was often worried and unsure about what to expect, but Dr. Shikha's reassuring words always calmed me. She took the time to listen carefully to my concerns and explained everything clearly. Her deep ********* *** experience gave me confidence that I was in good hands during both my normal and caesarean delivery.

I am very thankful to Dr. Shikha for being with me through both pregnancies. I truly appreciate her exceptional care and highly recommend her to all women.
-Monika

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bleeding During Pregnancy,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
Thank you is very small for guardian angel  (Dr. Shikha Gurnani)

As of today, I dont mind saying that Dr. Gurnani was not only my wife's doctor for pregnancy but was like a mother and guardian angel who delivered an angel to us after three years of her medical efforts and my wife's two miscarriages.  
Would like to give you a crisp background to substantiate the headline.

First Year_Dec 2016
I went to the doctor in 2016 Dec for my wife's first pregnancy after reading reviews on practo. I can tell you that I didn't feel its my first visit, the staff was very courteous but i was concerned about the doctor considering my past experiences with other doctors who were rude and arrogant.  But doctor removed all my preconceived notions and welcomed us as she knew us before. 
Doctor started the treatment but unfortunately our baby couldn't survive more that 1.5 months and my wife went under D&C. I thought that Doctor like others will not be bothered about our loss but she tried to console us like a mother.

Second Year_Dec 2018

After the first miscarriage, we planned again in 2018 and visited the doctor. I was surprised to see that not only the staff but doctor knew our names even after 2 years. Doctor was happier than us to see us once again and she started the treatment once again but unfortunately our baby didint survive again after 1.5 months from the conception.  Doctor was also surprised with that but you cannot change whats written in your destiny.  Even in that situation i didnt lose my trust on doctor and left everything to her for further treatment whereas if it could have been other patient then they could have blamed the doctor.

Third Year_July 2019

After the completion of healing period we visited the "same" doctor once again in July 2019 for the treatment. I still remember the conversation, Doctor said "I will not leave any stone unturned and will apply whatever i have learned to make you proud parents but you need to trust me" and I replied " I wont be standing here with my wife once again, I have immense trust in you". Doctor advised us some tests & medicines and started the treatment. During the course of the treatment, Doctor used to advise and guide us like a mother not as a doctor. She was available for us all the time (but we didnt took advantage of that and didnt disturb her in nights and weekends unless its urgent and critical). Even this pregnancy was not a cake walk for us but doctor held our hands and walked with us throughout the pregnancy. There were high chances of caesarean but doctor was pushing for normal delivery and i was astonished when my wife delivered the baby girl in the night of 31st March through normal delivery. 

I cannot pay back ever to the doctor what she has done for us, Doctor came like a guardian angel in our life who filled our life with everlasting happiness. I can keep on writing but it will not be enough.
reply_text: thanks for the lovely words of appreciation

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When u hold ur tiny angel in your hands for the first time - you become a parent. That‚Äôs what often people say, but they are wrong. 
The day one gets to know that they have conceived is when the journey of parenthood begins.
We were early birds üòÅ... figured it out in the 3rd week that we had conceived. Being proactive I had shortlisted a few and finalized onto one particular doctor basis on the reviews, rating, experience from Practo before hand.  So we rushed with the pregnancy kit test to her. 
A calm and composed, yet chirpy doctor on the other side... she had her mask on, but from her eyes I could read that she had a wide smile. She said that it looks that you have passed but let‚Äôs run some tests and be sure. That‚Äôs my baby‚Äôs first date with doctor Gurnani. 
In those 9 months I went through a lot - not being able to gain weight initially, a bit of complications in the ultra sound, a small car accident and got infected with Coronavirus ü§¶üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è.
Being from hospitality I was working 14 hours - traveling 60kms - and constantly on my feet - parents in a different city. The reason I am sharing all this is because I want you to understand what kind of support I got from her. 
There are times I would msg her with silly questions, would rush  into the clinic with serious issues and a lot more...but there was not a single time I gave a second thought about considering someone else. My husband would make fun of me, that I often found reasons to meet her as it was comforting. May be it was true.
I wanted a normal delivery. She had recommended to stay active without stressing and I chose to work till the last month and one day I was at work and wasn‚Äôt sure if I was in labor so I messaged her and rushed once she confirmed.
A samosa, a plate of chowmein and a few hours later - I had my angel in my arms.
Normal delivery - few extra stitches (as my body wasn‚Äôt ready cos it was bit ahead of EDD) but no one else could have made that moment so beautiful for me. As she was stitching me up and scolding me like a momma ... I laughed and said - u can‚Äôt get irritated - m gonna come back in a  few years for the next one. 
For me to say that on the table, at that point - you can understand what kind of trust she must have instilled in me. 
My husband and I are both chefs and in our words - like a perfect chef, she got the bun out of the oven, just right in time
Not to forget, there is pinky at the reception - she is a saviour when you need last minute help with getting an appointment on a busy day.
Loads of love
To Dr. Gurnani & BloomVision Family
From
Prerna, Sachin & Puchku (baby Neera)
reply_text: Thank dear for such lovely words and appreciation...it were mutual efforts... hoping that you are enjoying your motherhood now with Puchki...take care. Wishing the best always

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A truly amazing doctor hard to find and impossible to forget. this saying goes with Dr Shikha Gurnani perfectly. We came to know about Dr. Shikha Gurnani through one of our friend. Then we search out on practo. After reading so many positive reviews we decided to approach shikha mam for our first pregnancy in 2018. After meeting her we found her very straight forward and strict. She explained everything in detail and answered all my questions and cleared my all doubts. My pregnancy was natural and healthy. All my reports were normal.  But at 33 week I lost my child due to chord around her neck in the stomach only. I was devastated and broken. Because she approached for a normal delivery we waited for  3 days but due to hard luck we moved to c-sec. I thought I would never going to have a child. There must be some medical problem with me. But at that point of time Shikha mam supported me a lot. She promised me that you are going to have your baby in one year. I still remembered her words " tera baccha toh me hi karungi," and dont know how .... i got a ray of hope. She advised me to take one year gap due to c sec. But actual struggle started now. Suddenly I started to gain weight. After 5 months of operation I visited her clinic again and she advised me to take some tests. Then we found some medical problem with me. And now before thinking about pregnancy we need to settle down my medical condition. I followed her instructions and contact to the  specialist suggested by her only. And guess what in only 2 months my health was  in control. Then after waiting for 2 more months we decided to conceive again. In January 2020 I conceived again by the grace of God. And decided to consult her only. In my 2nd pregnancy she took all the precautions she can. Due to my first pregnancy experience & this pandemic of corona,I was also very much scared. She guided me whenever I had any doubt or problem even on phone / WhatsApp.  She has lovely combination of professionalism and care. She never gave up on me, even when I had doubt about my pregnancy. One of the best doctor and person we have ever met. Her positive approach & beautiful smile made everything easy. She kept her promise  Due to her continuous efforts and by the Grace of god we are blessed with  a healthy baby boy. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First apologies for posting this too late, But I feel Dr. Shikha Gurnani deserves to be reviewed as the dedication & oneness she gives to her patients is really commendable. 
This is after 11 years of our marriage we took decision to have second baby as we were already blessed with 10 year old son. We approached a female gynecologist (don't want to mention her name) with which we had a very negative and bad experience of life. Due to non-co-operation& handling the case lightly my wife went thru a great trauma.
 Again after a year we decided to take another chance for second baby, then we decided to search on practo for the same and find a suitable doctor for my wife treatment and course. We searched for good gynecologist in Dwarka. Dr. Shikha has 97% recommendations & positive reviews and we were surprised to see such a high positive feedback. We also saw 100% reviews for other doctors but the no. of reviewers were too less as compared to Dr. Shikha. 
Just at our first appointment with her we were happy & satisfied that yes Dr. Shikha will be good mentor & friend for my wife who had already faced so much trauma a year back. She is such an amazing doctor & individual, she built confidence in our mind that my wife can deliver even at the age of 39 years.
She also guided us the genetic problems as this age a woman can have, so with her advice we went for genetic test and result was very satisfying. At first we were in great fear of this test but the way she guided was so awesome that all went well.  We were so comfortable while talking to her and she always explained everything in a positive manner. We also discussed a problem of my wife which she had after her first delivery 10 years ago, she took is so calmly and tell us don‚Äôt to worry as she will be operating that vein also which causes problem during her mensuration time. 
Finally the day came when i took my wife to  Venkateshwar hospital because she was feeling a severe pain and even at 7 AM in morning i called up doctor and asked for suggestion , she immediately told me don‚Äôt to worry and take her to hospital as she will be guiding the staff there for further check processes . We reached hospital around 8 AM & found that she already instructed the staff and doctor on duty. My wife was so much in pain but she told doctor to wait for our elder son to back from school as he wished to be present at the time of baby birth for which she handled the situation so beautifully and managed to agree her for immediate C-Section.
I can still remember that moment when Dr. Shikha came out from labor room and congratulates me for been blessed with a Baby Girl (that is what we wished for). I had tear in my eyes & It was like a dream come true after seeing my little baby girl. Our world is filled with joy forever. She also handled the post-delivery complication which my wife faced in last delivery. 
It would not have been possible without the Dr. Shikha's utmost dedication, due diligence and professional attitude in the complete process. Another praise-worthy initiative is that she requests every parent after the delivery to plant a tree in the name of the new born baby (which is still pending from my side). We are very grateful & thankful to Dr Shikha Gurnani for the wonderful journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is not a feedback note; these are our feelings straight out of our hearts, gratitude towards Shikha Ma‚Äôam. She is no less than ‚ÄúA Living God‚Äù for us. I can‚Äôt explain more in words that how the hope and love Shikha Ma‚Äôam showered on us.Our journey with her started like this ‚Äì I was diagnosed and operated with myomectomy twice within a short span of 4 years. My second myomectomy was a nightmare though it was performed by a reputed doctor in a renowned hospital.¬†We thought of planning for our second baby after one year of my surgery. We visited a famous gynaecologist for pre-natal consultation. She straight away sent us for IVF. We somehow couldn‚Äôt make up our minds for IVF; hence we thought of going the natural way and visited Dr. Shikha as I have already heard so many positive responses about her.I would like to name it as miracle or destiny as in our 2nd¬†visit to Shikha ma‚Äôam, we were confirmed with positive result of pregnancy. She then consulted me with utmost empathy and prepared us mentally for the wonderful nine months journey of pregnancy.Each time we visited her, we used to come out of her clinic with happy faces and confidence in hearts **** ** *** ** *** ***** ****** **** ********** ********* ** ** ******** *** ****** **** we feel safe with her. She used to clarify all my serious / silly queries with patience. I always look forward to her routine check-ups as meeting her is such a pleasant experience altogether. She arranges pre-natal class which was very informative.I had issues with high BP throughout my pregnancy. Ma‚Äôam managed this serious condition so smoothly and without giving us any anxiety which she used to take on behalf of us without even showing it to us. She makes situations so normal with her humorous nature and at the same time keeps strict check on the patients whenever necessary, which is so amazing and unique quality of her.Finally, I had caesarean in first week of October, which was a high risk surgery, but I didn‚Äôt feel it even for a single moment, except for written in the medical reports. I was apprehensive this time because of my past experience with myomectomy surgery, but the surgery was so smooth and painless that I was on my feet walking comfortably from day 3rd¬†morning itself.Her always smiling face and excellent counseling qualities did wonders in our pregnancy and after delivery recovery as well.Here I would like to mention one more quality which is so unique about Shikha Ma‚Äôam. Her ‚Äúpersonal touch‚Äù with the patients does magic in the healing process. Our baby was admitted in the NICU for few days. She used to continuously take updates from the concerned pediatrician and share the same with us. Till the time baby came home, she was continuously in touch with the pediatrician as well as with us. I wonder if these level of ‚Äúpersonal connection‚Äù any other gynaecologist share with their patients.Another praise-worthy matter is that she requests every patient after the delivery to plant a tree in the name of the new born baby. This unique initiative has touched our hearts very much. In nutshell she is a gem of a person.Shikha ma‚Äôam, last but certainly not the least, we would like to ‚ÄúThank you‚Äù for all the guidance, counseling, support and everything you did for us and you are still these doing for us.¬†Because of Shikha ma‚Äôam, today we have the most precious gift, our baby, with us. She is not only a doctor; she is a friend, guide and mentor for life.We would like to recommend her to each and everyone who seeks gynaecology and obstetrician care.Thanks You ‚ÄúPracto‚Äù for giving us the opportunity to connect to such a lovely and amazing doctor and human being ‚Äì Dr. Shikha Gurnani.With lots of love and best wishesBandana and Prachurjya

review:
Me and my wife were expecting our first baby and we were looking for a good Gynecologists who can take care of my wife and should have good knowledge and experience. We were going through Practo reviews and came to know about Dr. Shikha Gurnani. 

Her reviews on Practo were very positive which made us little skeptical about the genuineness of her reviews. Still we took the appointment and went to Genesis to meet her. We talked to many of her patients sitting outside in the waiting area about their overall experience with the doctor. They all were very happy and satisfied. We got little relief hearing the reviews directly from her patients rather relying only on Practo.

When we met her on our first appointment at Genesis, she was very polite, down to earth yet caring and experience. We always wanted to have Normal Delivery and she always supported and motivated us for the same. She guided us very well and my wife followed all her instructions to have normal delivery. She is always available  on call or what's app for help and support. Now we are proud parents as my wife delivered a baby boy via Normal Delivery at Venkateshwar Hospital, Dwarka.

Long Story Short -  It has been an amazing journey with Dr Shikha. She's a great doctor one can wish for.  She is personable, friendly, calm, and an absolute joy to talk to. she will make you feel like home and comfortable to tell your problems easily. She's a perfect combination of professional doctor and a good friend.

Going through childbirth is a mix of immense pain followed by immense happiness. In this journey, the presence of a wonderful doctor like you is simply priceless. Thanks doctor, for comforting my wife and taking away all her stress.

We would like to 'highly highly highly' recommend Dr. Shikha to all expecting parents who are looking for a trustworthy and experience doctor. 

Lots of love to Dr. Shikha :)

Regards,
Sonali, Jatin and little Taarush.

review:
I got to know about Dr. Shikha through Practo in 2015, when I just got married. It was just been three days that me and husband before leaving for honeymoon wanted to know more about the family planning. She was amazed and complimented us for our pro approach. Since then I have been in touch with Dr. Shikha. On Aug 2017 I got to know that I was pregnant. My immediate attention was to approach Dr. Shikha. I was much relieved with her advise. She is friendly and professional. Even the doctor attendant was calm. Indeed there was rush of patients but she never loses her calm. Our faith grew more when my mother in law and mother went to meet her. Instantly their faith in her was quite appreciative.
The 09 months pregnancy was a interestingly bit inconvenient but joyful phase. Her medicines and health advise were appropriate. Though I was lean and unable to put on required weight. She motivated me enough through different means. Sometimes happily sometimes like a strict teacher :) Her only suggestion to me was to have a normal delivery for which I was so scared. Her confidence and ability to create a positive mind set let me to go for normal delivery. 
By the time I came to my 08 months she suggested me to do exercises. I was all time working professional. On generic regular follow check up day on 17th March, she did examine me and wished me good luck for a happy news. 
Voila !! I was in labour on the same evening and went to Hospital. By 10pm I was admitted and within an hour I was blessed with a baby girl. 
Dr. Shikha has been extremely honest, approachable and sincere in her profession. I am grateful that I could find her well in time. My family and me all are happy with her. For sure she needs to be recognised and referred to. 

Thank you Dr. Shikha

Best regards 
Neha Sharma Yadav

review: Dr. Shikha is an absolutely amazing doctor and nice cheerful human being. I consulted her to conceive. She told me the exact situation of my hormonal issues without giving any wrong expectations. Though I was aware of my pcod and bad hormonal levels already. So it was a major concern for me that how much time it will take to resolve my issue. I planned my pregnancy after 5 years of my marriage and have a fear in my mind somewhere that people comments should not be true that in starting you are not planning and later you will be too late to conceive. But as I was not ready mentally and physically so I took risk of planning late . But when I made a decision to conceive, it was really hard to wait and made me worried. As I have wasted 1 year on homeopathic treatment for pcod and it made my pcod more worse than any improvement. So I choose Dr. Shikha after reading positive reviews on practo... And I found her exactly lucky doctor for me. She helped me to conceive within 6 months. With my bad levels of hormones, 6 months is not long time as there were possibilities of more time. I was really worried whether I will conceive or not after listening my friends stories of pcod and there conceiving time. But I conceived in 1st month of trying after getting my hormones balanced under the proper guidance of Dr. Shikha for 6 months. I can proudly say that miracle happens when you and Dr. both have trust and patience üòä I had instances of pain in my lower abdomen and sebaceous cysts during my pregnancy. But my pregnancy journey got smooth under proper supervision of Dr. Shikha and I delivered a healthy baby last week. Thank you so much Dr. Shikha for everything! Always be happy and healthy!

Nine months of pregnancy felt like a breeze, thanks to the outstanding efforts of Dr. Shikha Gurnani( Angle on the earth). Lots of love Mam, Keep delivering happiness in everyone's life as you have given me the best gift of my life Kanishk and Nitya . God bless you and your Family :)

From Minakshi & Jagat

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to Dr. shikha gurnani when I was about 23 weeks pregnant. The reason being that she was my third doctor in this pregnancy. It's not that other two doctors i went to were bad but Dr. shikha's friendly and calm nature made me feel very comfortable. Her way of explaining everything and making sure that you understand her treatment is something you don't find in many doctors these days. And no matter how late it is or how many patient she have, she will always give proper time and listen to your every question and answer them. she didn't recommend any unnecessary tests and when I told her that I want a normal delivery she was more than supportive of that. Although she didn't make any promises and would tell me everything clearly. I was always looking forward to Meeting her, because she would put my mind to ease with her suggestions and treatment. I  normally delivered  a healthy baby girl on 20th December with her help in the morning all because as soon as she came to know I was in labor and in the hospital she came running, that's how much she is dedicated for her patients and would recommend everyone to consult her and you can blindly trust her. For me she is an angel and my permanent gynecologist. And the staff is also supper nice in her clinic. The clinic is clean and hygienic. Dr. shikha is very gentle and always smiling. I can go on and on about how great she is but truly if you are looking for an ob/gyn, she is the one you should go to. And to Dr. shikha, thank you so much for your guidance and support throughout this journey and bringing my beautiful daughter into this world. It couldn't have been easy without you so thank you and I wish you all the best for your future. üòäüíï

review:
Dr. Shikha is the Doctor I would highly recommend if you prefer to have a smooth happy and painless (mentally) pregnancy.

Firstly she is all welcoming and so approachable to ask any questions and encourages both the partners to ask questions and answers in a way that can be understood and relate to the current stage and experience that your partner goes trough in all the three trimesters. Her ability to communicate well and explain difficult topics in a simple and understanding manner is highly commendable and as a male partner I did not have any hesitation to be approachable to her which helped me to support my partner in the best way possible. 

Secondly her clinic is very organised in terms of literature charts and other multiple things and she has ensured her support staff is well trained and explain things in a very easy manner which becomes very easy to handle.

Thirdly her friendliness and approachability will help you and your partner to ensure the entire journey of pregnancy remains memorable. At the end of the day what matters is how the journey of the 9 months are and the many good memories that are gathered during this time and she ensures it‚Äôs done in a very efficient manner.

We were blessed with a baby boy and all thankful to her to ensure our journey is a memorable and happy one. We will always remain thankful and blessed to find a doctor of such high caliber and knowledge to always remain indebted to her.

Thank you Dr Shikha for being such a nice human first and then the doctor.


Love and regards

Priyanshu, Jitesh & Vayu (our little one)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
After moving to dwarka we took decision to have second baby even after 10 years of marriage and 9 year old son. We approached other famous doctor in dwarka. After first appointment with her we realized that We can not move forward with her as she was not approachable and extremely busy. 

We again starting searching for a good Gynecologist and our search landed at Dr Shikha Gurnani Clinic through Practo. Some time the reviews created doubt in mind how a doctor can have 97% positive feedbacks. But after meeting with her first time she built confidence in our mind that my wife can deliver normally even at the age of 37 years. 

In each pregenancy check-up she was becoming more of a friend than doctor. We were so comfortable while talking to her that we shared every single point with her which she explained in positive manner. We already told her that my wife had PPH in last delivery. Her best part was that she always encouraged my wife for NVD and warned her if my wife missed any instruction she gave in last visit. Some of the warnings are soft and some are very strict (like a good teacher). We were very happy to have a good Gynecologist but the best part of the doctor was yet to come.

In the last visit before pregnancy she wishes us luck for the delivery and next day my wife came into labour. We went to Venkateshwar hospital next day morning at 10 am after talking to her. She already talked to the on-duty doctor and instructed them before we reached there. Every thing was very slow before she entered into the hospital. She changed the picture just after entering the labour room. My wife was so much exhausted and told doctor for C-section. But it was the doctor who motivated my wife to put all the energy and not to loose confidence. She left no stone unturned to get the normal delivery and succeeded.

I can still remember her voice (PUSH PUSH.... :) ) which was coming out from Labour room. She also handled the post delivery complication which my wife faced in last delivery. It was like a dream come true after hearing first cry of the baby.

We are very grateful to Dr Shikha Gurnani for the wonderful journey. It wouldn't be easy without you and your support. Thanks for the motivation you gave throughout the journey. 

Thank you so much Doctor!!!!

Regards,
Rohit & Dolly

review:
I recently had my first baby and I couldn't have done it without the amazing help and support of my gynecologist. From the very beginning of my pregnancy journey, Dr Shikha was there for me every step of the way. 

She took the time to explain everything to me in detail and answered all of my questions with patience and care. I never felt rushed or dismissed during my appointments, which made me feel comfortable and at ease. Her expertise and knowledge in this field is evident in the way she handled my appointments and any potential issues that arose. She was always professional and attentive, making me feel like I was in good hands.

I highly recommend Dr. Shikha to any expecting mothers. Her expertise, compassion, and professionalism make her an exceptional gynecologist and I am grateful to have her as my doctor. I am confident that she will continue to provide the same level of care to all her patients. Thank you, Dr. Shikha, for being a wonderful doctor and making my first pregnancy experience a positive one.

tags: None
review:
My wife recently visited this doctor in the hopes of rescheduling her menstrual cycle to align with an upcoming trip. We had mixed feelings about the experience.

On the positive side, the doctor‚Äôs recommendation of taking medication to adjust her cycle worked effectively. My wife started the medication on the fourth day of her cycle, and it successfully achieved the desired result. The 21-day prescription provided clear instructions, and there were no issues with its effectiveness.

However, we were disappointed with the additional consultation charges. ** ****** *********** *** *** ****** ** **** ** **** ***** ** *** ****** *** ** *** ***** **** ** ********* *** *********** It would have been more convenient and cost-effective if the doctor had recommended the medication during the initial consultation.

In summary, while we appreciate the effectiveness of the treatment, the additional consultation charges left us with mixed feelings about the overall experience. We hope the clinic can streamline their processes to provide a more efficient and cost-effective service to their patients.

review:
I found Dr Shikha through Practo and visited her for Pre and post pregnancy care, for my delivery and I am really happy to share that it was the best decision.
She prescribed minimal medicines( only required vitamins) throughout my pregnancy and have been helpful for all my doubts. Her suggestions, her care plan and all the vitamins, diet changes were really helpful for me. 
All I ever wanted throughout my pregnancy was a Vaginal delivery and she help me attain that. She visited me regularly in labor room which was really reassuring to me and to my family. 
My labor was really long and I wanted to give up on vaginal delivery but she didn‚Äôt give up and helped me. 
Really grateful to God and to her for everything went well. 
Thank you Mam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am a mother of 6 years old boy. Before visiting Dr. Shikha I suffered with 2 unsuccessful pregnancies. The doctors I consulted before couldn‚Äôt identify the root cause of these 2 incidents which took place around 7-8 weeks of pregnancies. Dr. Shikha observed that I was suffering from hypertension which was the primary reason for my two previous failures.
Dr. Shikha took care with everything during my next pregnancy. Every time I visited the clinic she heard all my concerns even when they were pretty obvious for a pregnant woman. 
During throughout journey she given me right advises regarding my diet and weight control.
She prescribed only those medicines which were suitable for my situation.
She even adjusted with our choice of hospital selection which was last on her preference list.
Finally our wish of 2nd child fulfilled under her supervision and we are now parent of a baby girl.
Needless to mention I am consulting her for my post pregnancy care.
Thank You so much Dr. Shikha again.

tags: None
review:
I think a constricted space on a webpage wouldn‚Äôt be enough to write a review for Dr. Shikha Gurnani. (The same also holds true for the current available space at Bloom Clinic ‚Äì A larger space is now needed for catering more and more needy women)

I went to the doctor with a simple problem of irregular periods expecting a normal treatment with some requisite tablets. Despite informing the doctor that I had done a pregnancy test a week ago, she insisted in doing it again as she was confident it was pregnancy related. It turned out to be precise and I was very glad and relieved to know the result.

The way the doctor instilled the confidence was amazing and I continued with her throughout my pregnancy. I felt the best part about her is that she is a good listener, devoted considerably good time with her patients and guides them well. She can handle complications well by virtue of her experience and neither shows any panic nor allows her patients to get panicked. Not only till delivery but her guidance even post-delivery is highly appreciable.

She is a part of 2-3 hospitals as of now (hope more and more added to her basket) and is always on her toes taking care of any emergencies irrespective of time.  

I would definitely recommend her as a preferred choice for all the women.
reply_text: Thank you Ruchira ....lovely ..sweet words...these positive feedbacks keeps us going...hopefully a bigger clinic for your 2nd pregnancy..

tags: None
review: We were planning for our first child and my wife had first ectopic pregnancy. When she conceived again we went the same doctor which treated her for the ectopic. Although she was very experienced but my wife was not comfortable with her to get answers of all the queries as it was our first child and we had a lot of worries. We started to search for another Gynecologist in Dwarka and someone in my company recommended Dr. Shikha. She is fantastic doctor as well as a very cheerful,always smiling person and on very first visit my wife was soo..happy talking to her, you never feel like you are talking to doctor, she makes you feel like you are talking to your good friend who inspires you to do your best always assure that everything will be fine with some positive note.She is full of positivity which always inspired us to be positive in this very special phase of our life. We had a lot of queries and she never got irritate with our silly questions and explained each and everything we asked no matter how small it is. With great guidance and supervision of Dr. Shikha we enjoyed nine months of my wife's pregnancy without any major complication and finally my wife gave birth to little Princess. Thanks a lot Dr. Shikha for all your support and guidance. We will always be greatful to you for guiding us in becoming the proud parents of Our Princess...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Nearly one and half years ago, me and my husband were fortunate enough to have seen Dr. Shikha in hope of experiencing the amazing journey of pregnancy again and eventually completing my family. Earlier we were having a daughter who was born in 2014 after many complications. Since then we had been planning for our second child but were unable to do so because of certain pregnancy issues. From our very first meeting, my husband and I both sensed an ease with Dr. Shikha's approach; she was very methodical in every step and explained the reasons on every decision to be made. Even after every hurdle we encountered, she held our hands every step of the way, and gave us confidence that we will eventually become parents again. Her positive and genuine approach made me feel no longer a patient, but a part of her family. Now, fast forward six years later...our home is finally filled with the joy and laughter of a baby boy. Now my family is complete. 
So, what words come to mind to describe Dr. Shikha and the exceptional care I received from her? Genuine kindness, trustworthy, passionate, lifelong friend, and most importantly, my guardian angel."
Thanks alot Dr. Shikha.  It wouldn't have been possible without you.

review:
After visiting several doctors we came to know about Dr. Shikha Gurnani through online research & I must say Practo helped me a lot. Thanks Practo!
Doctor was really friendly & humble and at same time she was very professional & straight forward.
My wife was pregnant with twins & our main concern was to take the pregnancy to 9th month which is not so easy now days as twins are usually born pre-term - from 28 to 35 weeks (7th or 8th month) & then require special neonatal care. Doctor was also concerned for the same & guided us so well regarding each & everything whether it is medicines, vaccinations, activities or diet..she was so caring.

Finally, by the grace of god we reached to 9th month though it was tough for my wife but she managed and now we are more than happy to share that we have been blessed with baby girl & boy. Our world is filled with joy forever.
It would not have been possible without the doctor's utmost dedication, due diligence and professional attitude in the complete process.
I Would definitely like to thank and recommend her.
"The best visit to a gynecologist till date"
Thanks!
Best Regards
Apti & Dheeraj Arora

review: When I first went to Dr Shikha Gurnani, I did not even suspect I was pregnant but the stress I was under (I had recently tested positive for hypothyroidism) turned into a pleasant surprise as I discovered that I had conceived. A very pleasant, friendly and accessible doctor that she is, it immensely helped that I and my husband were under her guidance through that crucial phase of our lives that included dealing with multiple physical, emotional changes. With her calm and ever smiling demeanour she would listen to every little detail or doubt I had in my mind and very patiently offer her set of advises. On many occassions, we would call/ message her to seek her suggestion for some problem or the other and she always responded positively. She helped me deliver a healthy baby boy two weeks back and even though it was a c- sec, I managed to ride through it without much difficulty- thanks to the trust Dr Shikha had generated in me. I am happy I went to her based on the reviews on Practo and relied on my instinct. I recommend her strongly to all would-be/ planning- to- be mothers in and around Dwarka.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Rare are the doctors who goes out of their way for patients. Needless to say Dr Shikha is an amazing doctor who genuinely cares for her patients. We visited her for our first pregnancy after being referred to her by a friend. She is very straightforward and explains everything to the point. I went into labor in 35 weeks. I was 3.5cm dilated with minimal pains. But suddenly the baby's heartbeat dropped to 50. I was being taken to OT for a CS because of severe fetal distress. I could feel the doctor herself was not happy for CS. When we reached OT, the baby's heartbeat was back to normal. She suggested we wait for another contraction in OT . Though the OT people were really ready to go for CS. She really tried and with her trials, within 2 hours I had normal delivery. I can say if there would have been any other doctor, we would not have  returned back from OT without a CS. Its because of her determination the normal delivery was possible. Our entire journey of pregnancy has been truly amazing with her. We are really thankful for her dedication. Wishing her all the best!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It all started in 2019 where we were lost and in the darkest phase of our life as we didn't know where to go as whosoever we visited only hinted IVF and other options apart from natural conception.However, Dr. Shikha was the only one who showed light on the other side of the tunnel as she identified lifestyle hazards, dieting and most importantly the criticality of PCOD issues which was never diagnosed earlier by anyone..She right away directed us to Dietician in order to lower the levels of PCOD and weight at the same time She used to keep a close watch on all the test reports from time to time and was real strict in her own way however she used to have brief chats in between those short visits to her clinic.She just tries to keep things in place throughout; all you need to do is just listen to her and follow religiously whatever she says and at the end she will surely strike a perfect balance to lead it to a successful delivery I could assure you.Last but not the least after I saw my daughter for the first time I felt like crying and gestured Namaste to Dr. Shikha all I tried to mean is what she did for us we will never forget this journey with her from where she pulled us out.I would definitely recommend her to all such couples whosoever are still struggling to conceive and are still clueless as what to do next.Thank you so much  Dr. Shikha for your endless support throughout (Susnata & Tania)ü§óü§ó

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Visited Dr. Shikha Gurnani following a colleague's reference as my wife's early pregnancy scans were not too encouraging. Dr. Shikha was helpful in identifying the probable causes. She assessed immediate requirements including age related management for the expectant mother. The medication prescribed along with advise related to supportive management including diet, rest, lifestyle changes etc. helped ensuring the subsequent scans gradually improved resulting in a healthy pregnancy. She continued to ensure relevant scans and medical tests were conducted at right times to cover all necessary risk profiles. Though there was still a bit of complication right at the end of pregnancy, however, she managed the same pretty well. She extended all the necessary support post delivery as well. Our child had to undergo an observation period due to some post delivery complications, however, Dr. Shikha continued to ensure we had all the awareness of the management treatment though this was not her direct responsibility.

We are really happy with the friendliness and overall support provided by Dr. Shikha Gurnani.
reply_text: Thank you dear Anshu.. For all the trust you had in me and for these words of appreciation and encouragement which keeps me motivated and going.. Take care dear.

review:
We went to Dr. Shikha Gurnani when I was 5 weeks pregnant and she was the first gynaecologist whom we consulted after concieving. After meeting for the first time, we did not even think of consulting another gynaecologist because she explained everything very clearly with a positive approach. She is very active, understanding and listen to all our queries very carefully and calmly always with a smile on her face. She always guided us with actual scenario and we also trusted her and simply followed each and every advise given by her throughout my pregnancy.  She gives proper time to all the patients regardless of the queue of patients at clinic. The clinic is also very clean and hygienic. She never recommended unnecessary medications and tests. Apart from regular visits, she was always available 24 hrs for all our queries and responds quickly whenever we needed.

We are blessed with a baby boy on 11th December 2019. I really feel short of words to express thanks and gratitude to Dr. Shikha Gurnani. Thank you so much Mam for guiding us and handling my pregnancy and delivery so smoothly and effectively. May God bless you with all the success and happiness in your life. We highly recommend Dr. Shikha Gurnani to all couples searching for gynaecologist. *** ** *** **** ************* *** *** **** *****

Parwinder & Sumit

review: Pregnancy is an overwhelming experience and you need the right doctor at each step. With all dilemmas and unending doubts regarding baby's well being, I was always over sensitive. ************ * *** *** **** **** **** ******** *********** a great human being, and amazing gynae. She will not make promises for a normal delivery and would give you timely advices. Each trimester needs a different plan and she is just perfect to let you know what would come next! Also, she doesnt recommend unncessary medicines etc ( until required). I did take second opinions from senior doctors, *** ****** *** ** **** ** ******* My labour pain lasted for 6 hrs approx and it was a moment to remember. She did everything possible for a normal delivery and yes we did it :) Trust and compassion! Timely guidance! Making it fun ! And most importantly healthy mother and baby! Above all, she guessed the exact delivery date 15 days before. Shikha mam can't thank you enough :) Your positivity made me stronger after each visit.Heena & Ekjot

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** ****** with a big smile and cute face.

Hello everyone, this is my first review post, so please ignore me getting emotional. As you all know giving birth to baby is no less than a Herculean task. Since this was my first pregnancy, me n my husband were kind of nervous as wanted to be sure about everything and also there were lots of questions in our mind. So we wanted a good doctor who take us though with all the new things happening around us and guide us to right things. So we searched on  google for some good odd days and landed to ‚Äúpracto‚Äù, while scanning through the site we found Mrs Shikha and then as usual we read all the reviews and ratings and decided to go to her, in fact one of the best thing was distance to her clinic, it was right next our society. Got her appointment for next day and We went to her clinic, by the first look we know that our baby will deliver in safe hands, she has some positive aura, always a smiling face and friendly behaviour. Oh I forgot to mention our first doctor who disclose that I am pregnant, that experience was quite disappointed, don‚Äôt know why but that doctor is not friendly, so we searched for better Doc and got the Best for us.

Yes she is a strict at time but loveable as well, she always encouraged us for normal delivery, during my pregnancy I was gaining weight like anything, so she gave me strict diet schedule and put me on physical exercise so that whatever I eat should burn. I did lot of walk n exercise, she examine me internally in 7th month and told me that my body is very much made for normal delivery, so keep doing your physical activity. 
My due date was approaching, n my baby hasn‚Äôt dropped yet, It started to make us little worried cause if my pains or water break doesn‚Äôt happen then we would have to undergo for c-section, being baby was gaining weight and that would make complicate things further. She positively told us on 10th of feb and wished us all the very best for coming week, and yes on 12th feb my water broke, she asked me to go to hospital with in an hour time, with my husband we rushed to hospital immediately.
Next evening we had our bundle of joy, All the credit goes to our Dr. Shikha n her team in hospital they are very cooperative. They made my delivery very easy.
Huge thanks to doctor Shikha and her team. 

From me and my husband side this is the right choice, and HIGHLY RECOMMENDED DOCTOR
  

Thank you & regards 

Vibha n Ashish Gautam

tags: None
review:
Dr Shikha......... THE GOD
I was seeing some other gynaecologist before Dr. Shikha and was worried with complications explained to me by one of the so called "renowned gynaecologist of dwarka". We met Dr Shikha just to take a second opinion and was very sure we will stick to that famous doctor only. 
We had a high risk pregnancy and in the very first trimester of pregnancy that doctor said she will do a C section.

We shared all the reports with Dr. Shikha and didn't told her what previous doctor said. At the end of meeting we asked if we will be able to deliver normally and her answer was so impressive that we continued visiting her(it was not a yes).

Other doctor used to call us every 10 days and didn't really addressed the queries nicely and Dr. Shikha used to call us every 3 weeks and used to give good time and we always had  meaningful conversations. So we visited both doctors for 3 months and at the end of 3 months discovered Dr.Shikha is more of a family member than a doctor. She is not at all money minded person and has power to justify each and every penny you are spending at bloom clinic.
So at the end of second trimester Dr. Shikha was our only doctor.

She is a blend of old school and new school she will advise what all daadi naani does but in a more refined and quantified manner  and on the other hand she will tell you certain things which are very new and all oldies will say not to do like having water after delivery.
I would highly recommend Dr. Shikha to everyone, she tries her level best for normal delivery however you have to work on all her advises. You have to put in your hard work in exercises and have to have a balanced diet, Dr. shikha can't do anything if you don't exercise or don't follow her instructions....
Trust me if you go by what she says you will deliver a healthy baby and a normal delivery.
Thanks Dr. Shikha because of your guidance and care we were blessed with a healthy baby girl and it was a NORMAL DELIVERY..
Cheers!
Deepti Apurv

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Me and my wife consulted Dr Shikha approximately 3 years ago as we were planning to extend our family. she has patiently worked with us throughout the journey since we had lot of medical issues to overcome at the start, however, my wife wasn't able to conceive even after all those issues were resolved. me and my wife are both working professionals and have to deal with routine office pressures and that's where dr. Shikha guided us how should we avoid stress and enjoy our lives and how that would help us conceive a child. She is the most calm, composed and supportive doctor I have seen. She has been involved wholeheartedly with us as a doctor. She never recommend for unnecessary medication or test of any sort. At every regular checkup she explained us the next step to be taken with clarity about medication, test and ultrasound that have to be done. My wife had delivered a happy healthy baby girl via C-section delivery method since my wife gave up in labour room after staying in 12 hours of labour pain. Dr Shikha and her colleagues encouraged and motivated to whatever extent they could and then decided to go for C-section considering my wife had developed the high blood pressure tendency in last month of pregnancy and keeping her in labour for long was not good for both baby and my my wife. She  guided us thoroughly throughout the whole journey of pregnancy and it was one of the most fulfilling experience because at the end of the day we got to see our baby girl. Post delivery also as a doctor she guided us how to take care of my wife and the baby. She was always available throughout those 9 months  for consultation in clinic or over the phone. she made sure as a doctor that her patients are relaxed and have a happy healthy pregnancy. At the end I would just like to say that doctor Shikha is the best at her job as a doctor. Thank you doctor Shikha for all your care, love, support and guidance *** ***** *** **** ****** to me and my baby.

We visited Dr. Shikha about 10 months back and had absolutely amazing experience during my Pregnancy. She is more than a doctor, her easy going nature and positive attitude will always make you comfortable. 

She is very understanding and extremely helpful. She understand her patients, listen them calmly, provide correct advise and on top of that she is always available for her patient on phone, message, WhatsApp etc.  

Thanks to her support throughout the Pregnancy, I have successfully delivered a baby boy on this March. Dr. Shikha was there throughout to support us not only medically but also psychologically. She never made us visit her clinic unless and until required and always focused on normal delivery. I trust her blindly as a patient.

She apart from being a doctor, always attached with us as a true friend and well wisher.
 
We sincerely want to thank her from the core of our heart for all her efforts.

of beautiful journey but indeed the gained weight was not at all beautiful, and for it got lot of sweet scoldings also from Dr. Gurnani... 
She motivated me alot during this journey for maintaining weight but unfortunately I couldn't manage much with that but definitely whatever exercises and workout she told me to do I did that religiously. Thanks to Doctor Gurnani for her constant support and motivation, with 113kg weight I was able to deliver my baby boy normally. 
So for all the help and support, I would really like to thank doctor Gurnani from the bottom of my heartüòäüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Any form of thanking will fall short for Dr. Shikha from us. We know her for the last 6 years. During this long time we never thought of switching because of the person she is. She always kept our worries at bay in the best possible way. I have PCOS for many years with high AMH and also tubes are almost blocked. Despite all odds I had a normal conception. I was in Kolkata when I conceived. But we knew, Dr. Shikha would be the best gynaecologist for us. We drove back 1500 km to Delhi so that we can be under her guidance. Our baby boy was born at 35 weeks 2days through assisted normal delivery and it would have been impossible if Dr. Shikha wasn't there. We will remain forever indebted to her for being there for every time we needed her. I wish we have more doctors like her and pray for more success in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was consulting Doctor Shikha for around 5 months for my wife's delivery. She is a very friendly, experienced doctor and above all a great human being which makes her the perfect 'Go To' Doctor. She patiently answers to all queries and guides through both pre and post Delivery challenges.  We were consulting her for a normal delivery but on the final day once the labour pain started my wife started asking the doctor for a cesarean operation to avoid the pain. But the doctor explained her that there were no complications and there was no reason to go for an operation. The labour pain could be handled through epidural which we did on her advise. And finally Dr Shikha brought our little Angel to our world and we are grateful to her for this.

review: Shikha mam is not just a doctor for us she is our guide, friend and someone who we consider next to God. We have a long journey with mam. We initially visited mam when we were not able to conceive and I had fibroids. Mam encouraged us to keep on trying and started the medication. I did get pregnant but sadly suffered from ruptured ectopic which mam handled very efficiently. Later mam also did my myomectomy. During the covid times too she was available for her patients. No matter what query we had she always addressed it. Even my successful pregnancy was full of complications, mam really helped us throughout. She listens to all the problems and explains everything patiently. She has that positivity beaming which really kept us encouraging. I bet we couldn't have found a better gynae than mam. Thanks to mam that today I am holding my little bundle of joy.

I had few complications like Ulcerative Colitis, but she handled my pregnancy with utmost care and ease. She always strives for normal delivery even in the hardest situation, however during the end due to certain complications we had to opt for a caesarean delivery. She is a great person full of positivity and takes her job very seriously. She is gem of a person and we are glad that we had her during those testing times.

tags: None
review:
I visited her clinic because of  post menopausal bleeding. She advised  relevant tests. She has also given me medications to stopped bleeding and pain killer.  She was very polite. She explained the relevance of each test. Accordingly I did all the tests.  As per the findings of the tests a D and C and Biopsy was done. 
After the D and C bleeding has stopped. Cervical biopsy  and endometrial biopsy were done. The results of the endometrial biopsy was cystic glandular hyperplasia  of endometrium was discussed with me.  She did not advice for immediate hysterectomy.  If bleeding recur again then hysterectomy will be done. If within 6 months no bleeding occur she told me to go for ultrasound of the pelvis to check the thickness of the endometrium, only if there's an increase in thickness hysterectomy will be done. My husband and I are both doctors , we do find her approach technically sound. And very ethical.       
 
Dr. Evangeline
reply_text: thanks doc

review:
Dr shikha is not at all a good choice ** *** **** ** ** ***** **** * ****** ******* ********* Sorry it took me long to share my story. She is friendly and confident that gave me a wrong impression that she will handle my case nicely.  I started visiting her in my 7th month after coming back from bangalore..She went for c section **** ** *** ** **** *** ****** ** **** *** the reason was - " Baby ne potty kar dia".. I took the complete pain for 8-9 hrs . My delivery took place in lifeline hospital.. The way she handled my case was extremely bad.. *** *** *** ******* *** ****** **** ******* ** *** ****** *** *** *** **** ***** ******* **** ***** ** **** ****** ** *** *** *** ****** **** ********* * ** *** ****** **** **** ******* *** *** * ******** I had put all my efforts but at last just with this potty reason ahe went ahead with c section.* * **** ******** ******* **** ********* **** ********* *** *********** ***** ******* ******* *** **** ** ******** 

I still regret my decision for choosing her for my delivery.. The Only reason I am posting this today is if I can help someone not going through the same that I did.
reply_text:
Hello ,
Thanks for the review . I would like to share a few insights here . 
Lifeline hospital has closed for deliveries from last 4 years and I presume that you had delivered before that. So you writing a review after such a lag is not understandable .
As competent obstetrician we gave a fair trial of labour to every would be mother be it a weekday or Sunday as in your case and when their is meconium( as u told the baby had passed potty) with non progress it becomes an indication for cesarean section for betterment of baby and the mother . 

I appreciate that you reflected that a fair trial was given to you even on a Sunday but the tone of the review is nothing but an attempt to malign my good intentions towards  you and all mothers to be . 
The review is a concocted and distorted representation  of the facts .
Hope all is well at your end .

Thanks and regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are staying in Dwarka, New Delhi & hence were visiting nearby Bloom Clinic in Dwarka for my wife's regular pregnancy checkups. 
Dr. Shikha Gurnani was extremely welcoming. My first impression of her was she is a nice, calm, well poised, well behaved and extremely welcoming doctor. She not only gave us confidence of her availability during the pregnancy but also calmed both us. I found her an expert and the one who knows her work very well. After I came out of every visit, both of us were extremely happy that finally we found the right doctor. There was no other doubts thereafter. 
In the last month, they said that we would be doing C-sec on 16th Aug.2017 if you are not in labor pain. We went to her clinic on 16th Aug 2017. She did something on that day and advised us to go to hospital immediately. The time was 12.30 P.M. She assured her for visit in the hospital at around 3.00 P.M and she came on time and started motivating my wife for normal delivery. At around 4.22 P.M, I finally got our new baby boy in  our life. the amazing thing was that, my wife went for normal delivery and all credit goes to Shikha Gurnani.
 I really had a very nice & wonderful experience visiting Dr. Shikha. I would like to give a big big thanks to her for her ever comforting voice, her amazing expertise and ever welcoming nature. You are the best!!! Thank You! 
Hope to see you soon In GOA :)
(Hemant Dudeja, Rupanka Dua and little baby)
reply_text: Rupanka and Hemant...thank you for lovely feedback...and it's just not my efforts for a delivery...it is patients own efforts and determination that helps us also..so credit goes to Rupanka as well...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: There is saying that "Doctors save lives" but i would like to add up that "Doctors give lives too". Thank you very much Dr. Shikha gurnani and team for converting us from 2 to 3 and working selflessly during this pandemic situation.  First of all, we went to the Bloom vison clinic with a positive mindset as i had already received positive feedbacks from my close relatives but trust me that vibe turned more positive when my wife (with lil one inside) and I met her for the first time. Name of the clinic (Bloom vision) is in line with its work and results. In every scheduled visit, our learning, positivity, trust level, confidence  gradually increased because of her friendly nature, Knowledge, gratitude, patience and many more. So finally ,day came and we reached to the labour room. Me, my wife and family were very much convinced for cesarean treatment seeing my wife in pain and her health but our Doctor asssured us for healthy and normal delivery and ultimately i found my healthy bundle of joy in my lap. Both mother and child were healthy. Journey of my child from his mother's womb to his house was very beutiful, smooth and comfortable. It would be an understatement if i say i have described about doctor and her efforts in my feedback. Again, Thank you very much. God bless you and team.
reply_text: Thank you dear for the feedback and kind words of appreciation.. It means a lot to me.. The trust and faith the patient has in the doctor is of paramount importance.. Have a great parenthood experience now

Dr. Shikha Gurnani is our doctor which we consulted for pregnancy. In the first meeting itself I had a confidence that surely she will rectify my problem. She is so kindful, very supportive, always positive in her words, smiling face. During pregnancy also she has taken a special care for me. She will answer all our doubts with patience and keep smile in her face. She has given her personal mobile number and asked as to call any time if I have any problem.

I recommend my friends to Dr. Shikha (Bloom Vision Clinic) for pregnancy and almost all had a very good experience with her.
I'm really very my thankful to you mam. God will give all good things to you mam. Need your service for many patients like me. You are really awesome & caring mam.

Regards
Saraswati Bharti

review: My journey with Dr Shikha started around 3-4yrs ago when I found her through Practo for my PCOD problem. I spent lot of money prior to that going to other doctors but nobody could cure it. it's because of her my cycles became normal and I could conceive. As soon as I got to know that m pregnant through the kit she is the only one that came to my mind for my beautiful journey. And she proved it right this time as well. We had couple of complications but she handled them smoothly and we always came out with smiling faces. I guess she is the only doctor these days who encourages for normal delivery. She also held classes for free for group discussion amongst same month pregnant ladies. She will give you an elder sister feeling who is always there for you. Well, she gave me the most beautiful gift of my life. people think that they shouldn't have to visit doctors but I feel like being in touch with her always. ** ****** ******* ** *** **** ** ***** I can always count on her. Thank you so much!!!!

tags: None
review:
In this capitalist corporate era to shore up the 
"Nobel" tag attached to the profession is not easy but when you meet doctors like Dr Shikha, you realise it's not so difficult either, all you have to do is to know your stuff and care for your patients, and that's precisely what we experienced. Dr Shikha not only has complete command over her metier but also comes across as a warm and caring person with whom you can share all your medical concerns anytime. From day one, she kept our spirits up and till the end made sure that there is nothing left for us to worry. review:
My pregnancy and delivery experience has been awesome.
*** ** *** **** ********* ****** ** *****.
I believe that these 9 months are very precious and one always wants them the best as anything can go wrong at any point. So it is very helpful at this time to have good support from the doctor. We are happy we chose Dr.Shikha for baby's arrival . The reason was very simple - I had really good feedback for the doctor and our experience was also amazing when we visited the clinic for the first time.
